Class POElection

java.lang.Object
Election
POElection
public class POElection extends Election
A Popularity Only election. A POElection object is used to determine the winner in a given PO election.

      cands - Array of POCandidate objects representing the candidates in the election

    • determineWinner

      public void determineWinner()
      Determines the winner of the PO election, conducting all necessary tie breaking. Sets the winning candidates isWinner field to true

    • sortCandidates

      public void sortCandidates()
      Sorts the POCandidates in sorted descending order, with the winner at candidates[0]
